EmailTemplate.name: 11-09-21 RET NCR Freshop Q4 Webinar Invite 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Freshop Webinar: Holiday Best Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Webinar Nov 10th 2pm EST: Holiday Best Practices We are excited to host our first, but certainly not last, NCR Freshop Customer Webinar! Join us to talk holiday best practices – from merchandising to slot adjustments, we are here to give you some tips and tricks to get you through this busy holiday season. You won’t want to miss it! REGISTER NOW. <[[https://ncr.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncr&service=6&rnd=5.148979490424699E-4&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncr.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000005f2c9ba7373969df267b32f04aa17845e1ab1c5c81adf20a6382f5c8f498abfa9%26siteurl%3Dncr%26confViewID%3D209538140369592776%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAV-rP7KzpfgvMynLKgrjruQHm9YE0aYaF6SDWUtzJfcww2%26]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
